Convertible Notes Payable is a written promise to pay a note which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another, related security, at the option of the issuer and the holder.

CostOfRevenue.label: Cost of Revenue
CostOfRevenue.description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

DebtInstrumentAnnualPrincipalPayment.label: Debt Instrument, Annual Principal Payment
DebtInstrumentAnnualPrincipalPayment.description: Amount of the total principal payments made during the annual reporting period.

DeferredCostsCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Deferred Costs
DeferredCostsCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: The carrying amount of deferred costs.

DeferredIncome.label: Deferred Income
DeferredIncome.description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredRevenueNoncurrent.label: Deferred Revenue, Noncurrent
DeferredRevenueNoncurrent.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAs.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Goodwill and Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAs.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from intangible assets including goodwill.

DeferredTaxAssetsInventory.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Inventory
DeferredTaxAssetsInventory.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from inventory.

DeferredTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

DerivativeFixedInterestRate.label: Derivative, Fixed Interest Rate
DerivativeFixedInterestRate.description: Fixed interest rate related to the interest rate derivative.

DiscontinuedOperationEquityMethodInvestm.label: Discontinued Operation, Equity Method Investment Retained after Disposal, Ownership Interest Prior to Disposal
DiscontinuedOperationEquityMethodInvestm.description: Percent, prior to disposal, of ownership interest of a discontinued operation in which an equity method investment is retained.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Noncurrent
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Intangible Assets, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as intangible assets, excluding goodwill, attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Property, Plant and Equipment, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as property, plant and equipment attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DueFromOtherRelatedParties.label: Due from Other Related Parties
DueFromOtherRelatedParties.description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other.

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Related Parties
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

EarningsPerShareDilutedDistributed.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted, Distributed
EarningsPerShareDilutedDistributed.description: Dividends declared in the period and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid per security, taking into account all dilutive potential common shares outstanding during the period.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFore.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFore.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to statutory income tax expense (benefit) outside of the country of domicile.

EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.label: Employee Benefits and Share-based Compensation
EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.description: Amount of expense for employee benefit and equity-based compensation.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationAll.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount Capitalized
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationAll.description: Amount of cost capitalized for award under share-based payment arrangement.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Exercise of Option, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

ExcessStockSharesIssued.label: Excess Stock, Shares Issued
ExcessStockSharesIssued.description: Number of excess stock shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders.

ExcessStockSharesOutstanding.label: Excess Stock, Shares Outstanding
ExcessStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of excess stock held by shareholders.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Next Rolling Twelve Months
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

GrossProfit.label: Gross Profit
GrossProfit.description: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsIndefiniteli.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Indefinite-lived (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsIndefiniteli.description: Amount of impairment loss resulting from write-down of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

ImpairmentOfLeasehold.label: Impairment of Leasehold
ImpairmentOfLeasehold.description: The adjustment to reduce the value of existing agreements that specify the lessee's rights to use the leased property. This expense is charged when the estimates of future profits generated by the leased property are reduced.

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationForeignIncomeTaxR.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationForeignIncomeTaxR.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax expense (benefit).

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCompensation.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Compensation
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCompensation.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligation created by employee agreements whereby earned compensation will be paid in the future.

IncreaseDecreaseInNotesPayableCurrent.label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Payable, Current
IncreaseDecreaseInNotesPayableCurrent.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current portion (due within one year or one business cycle) of obligations evidenced by formal promissory notes.

IncreaseDecreaseInNotesReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInNotesReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the amounts due from borrowers for outstanding secured or unsecured loans evidenced by a note.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accounts Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayable.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InventoryAdjustments.label: Inventory Adjustments
InventoryAdjustments.description: Amount of inventory reserves for last-in first-out (LIFO) and other inventory valuation methods.

InventoryNetOfAllowancesCustomerAdvances.label: Inventory, Net of Allowances, Customer Advances and Progress Billings
InventoryNetOfAllowancesCustomerAdvances.description: Amount, after deduction of valuation reserves, other allowances, and customer advances received on long-term contracts or programs, of inventory expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within the normal operating cycle.

InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets.label: Investment Owned, Percent of Net Assets
InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets.description: Percent of net assets at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, each category should have a percent of net assets for the aggregated value of the Investments in the category.

Land.label: Land
Land.description: Amount before accumulated depletion of real estate held for productive use, excluding land held for sale.

LandImprovements.label: Land Improvements
LandImprovements.description: Amount before accumulated deprecation and depletion of additions or improvements to real estate held for productive use. Examples include, but are not limited to, walkways, driveways, fences, and parking lots.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LineOfCreditAssumed1.label: Line of Credit Assumed
LineOfCreditAssumed1.description: The fair value of line of credit assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseForgiveness1.label: Line of Credit Facility, Decrease, Forgiveness
LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseForgiveness1.description: Amount of decrease in line of credit facility from forgiveness by the holder of the line of credit.

LoansPayableCurrent.label: Loans Payable, Current
LoansPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

LoansPayableToBankCurrent.label: Loans Payable to Bank, Current
LoansPayableToBankCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of current portion of long-term loans payable to bank due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermLineOfCredit.label: Long-term Line of Credit, Noncurrent
LongTermLineOfCredit.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the noncurrent portion of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LongTermNotesPayable.label: Notes Payable, Noncurrent
LongTermNotesPayable.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

NoncontrollingInterestInVariableInterest.label: Noncontrolling Interest in Variable Interest Entity
NoncontrollingInterestInVariableInterest.description: Portion of equity (net assets) in a variable interest entity (VIE) not attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent entity. That is, this is the portion of equity in a VIE that is attributable to the noncontrolling interest (previously referred to as minority interest).

NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent.label: Notes and Loans Payable, Current
NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of all long-term notes and loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

NotesPayableCurrent.label: Notes Payable, Current
NotesPayableCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of long-term notes payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue.label: Other Cost of Operating Revenue
OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue.description: Other costs incurred during the reporting period related to other revenue generating activities.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherInventory.label: Other Inventory, Gross
OtherInventory.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of other inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherNoncashExpense.label: Other Noncash Expense
OtherNoncashExpense.description: Amount of expense or loss included in net income that result in no cash flow, classified as other.

OtherSellingAndMarketingExpense.label: Other Selling and Marketing Expense
OtherSellingAndMarketingExpense.description: Amount of selling and marketing expense classified as other.

PaymentsForOperatingActivities.label: Payments for Operating Activities
PaymentsForOperatingActivities.description: Total amount of cash paid for operating activities during the current period.

PaymentsForProceedsFromPreviousAcquisiti.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Previous Acquisition
PaymentsForProceedsFromPreviousAcquisiti.description: The net cash inflow or outflow associated with the aggregate amount of adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestme.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Short-term Investments
PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestme.description: The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of short-term investments with an original maturity that is three months or less which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToSuppliersAndEmployees.label: Payments to Suppliers and Employees
PaymentsToSuppliersAndEmployees.description: Cash payments to suppliers for goods and services provided and to employees for services provided.

PrepaidInterest.label: Prepaid Interest
PrepaidInterest.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for interest that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsPeri.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Period Increase (Decrease)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsPeri.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset representing the present value of future profits.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferr.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Convertible Preferred Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferr.description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stocks identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Net
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: The amount of property, by major property class, net of accumulated depreciation, subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.label: Related Party Transaction, Amounts of Transaction
RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RelatedPartyTransactionPurchasesFromRela.label: Related Party Transaction, Purchases from Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionPurchasesFromRela.description: Purchases during the period (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.label: Related Party Transaction, Selling, General and Administrative Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expenses resulting from transactions, excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements, with related party.

RemainingAmountsOfRegulatoryAssetsForWhi.label: Remaining Amounts of Regulatory Assets for which No Return on Investment During Recovery Period is Provided
RemainingAmountsOfRegulatoryAssetsForWhi.description: Remaining balance of regulatory assets for which no return on investment during recovery is provided. In some cases, a regulator may permit an enterprise to include a cost that would be charged to expense by an unregulated enterprise as an allowable cost over a period of time by amortizing that cost for rate-making purposes, but the regulator does not include the unrecovered amount in the rate base.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurre.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Noncurrent
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurre.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as noncurrent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedCashCurrent.label: Restricted Cash, Current
RestrictedCashCurrent.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

SecuredLongTermDebt.label: Secured Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
SecuredLongTermDebt.description: Carrying amount of collateralized debt obligations with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer, excluding the current portion. Obligations include, but not limited to, mortgage loans, chattel loans, and other borrowings secured by assets.

SellingAndMarketingExpense.label: Selling and Marketing Expense
SellingAndMarketingExpense.description: The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of non-vested equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that validly exist and are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Share-based Liabilities Paid
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of cash paid to settle liability for award under share-based payment arrangement.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Option, Nonvested, Weighted Average Exercise Price
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of non-vested options outstanding.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested in Period, Fair Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Fair value of options vested. Excludes equity instruments other than options, for example, but not limited to, share units, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of options vested.

SharesIssued.label: Shares, Issued
SharesIssued.description: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TemporaryEquityRedemptionPricePerShare.label: Temporary Equity, Redemption Price Per Share
TemporaryEquityRedemptionPricePerShare.description: Amount to be paid per share that is classified as temporary equity by entity upon redemption. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

VariableInterestEntityOwnershipPercentag.label: Variable Interest Entity, Qualitative or Quantitative Information, Ownership Percentage
VariableInterestEntityOwnershipPercentag.description: Percentage of the Variable Interest Entity's (VIE) voting interest owned by (or beneficial interest in) the reporting entity (directly or indirectly).

AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock.label: Additional Paid in Capital, Common Stock
AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock.description: Value received from shareholders in common stock-related transactions that are in excess of par value or stated value and amounts received from other stock-related transactions. Includes only common stock transactions (excludes preferred stock transactions). May be called contributed capital, capital in excess of par, capital surplus, or paid-in capital.

DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentRate.label: Debt Conversion, Converted Instrument, Rate
DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentRate.description: Dividend or interest rate associated with the financial instrument issued in exchange for the original debt being converted in a noncash or part noncash transaction. Noncash are transactions that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments. Part noncash refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments.

ForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgeLiabilityAt.label: Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedge Liability at Fair Value
ForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgeLiabilityAt.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative liabilities designated as foreign currency fair value hedging instruments.

LoansPayable.label: Loans Payable
LoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

LongTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.label: Long-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest, Percentage Rate
LongTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.description: The interest rate applicable to the portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossOth.label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Other Noncontrolling Interests, Nonredeemable
NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossOth.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to other nonredeemable noncontrolling equity holder.

NonInvestmentAssetsLessNonInvestmentLiab.label: Non Investment Assets Less Non Investment Liabilities, Percent of Net Assets
NonInvestmentAssetsLessNonInvestmentLiab.description: The percent of net assets of non investment assets and liabilities. This represents the percentage difference between the investments, including long and short positions, and net assets.

OtherLoansPayable.label: Other Loans Payable
OtherLoansPayable.description: Amount of long-term loans payable classified as other.

OtherPrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Other Prepaid Expense, Current
OtherPrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for other costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherReceivablesGrossCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Gross, Current
OtherReceivablesGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCa.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Carrying Amount
RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCa.description: As of the reporting date, the aggregate carrying amount of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

TaxCreditCarryforwardValuationAllowance.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Valuation Allowance
TaxCreditCarryforwardValuationAllowance.description: Amount of valuation allowance pertaining to the deferred tax asset representing potential future taxable deductions from tax credit carryforwards for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.label: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value, Adjustment
TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.description: Amount of decrease to net income for accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurr.label: Allowance for Doubtful Other Receivables, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurr.description: Amount of valuation allowance for receivables classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Other
BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: Amount of tangible or intangible assets, including a business or subsidiary of the acquirer transferred by the entity to the former owners of the acquiree. Excludes cash.

CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountO.label: Deferred Tax Liability Not Recognized, Amount of Unrecognized Deferred Tax Liability, Bad Debt Reserve for Tax Purposes of Qualified Lender
DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountO.description: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized because of the exceptions to comprehensive recognition of deferred taxes related to bad debt reserve for tax purposes of a qualified lender.

DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherCompre.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Transition Asset (Obligation), after Tax
DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherCompre.description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Current
FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as noncurrent.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredIncomeTaxes.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Income Taxes
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredIncomeTaxes.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the account that represents the temporary difference that results from Income or Loss that is recognized for accounting purposes but not for tax purposes and vice versa.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due from Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from other entities that could exert significant influence over the reporting entity.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

LeaseDepositLiability.label: Lease Deposit Liability
LeaseDepositLiability.description: Amount of liability for lease payments received, including variable lease payments, when collectability is not probable at commencement date for sales-type lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LineOfCreditFacilityAnnualPrincipalPayme.label: Line of Credit Facility, Annual Principal Payment
LineOfCreditFacilityAnnualPrincipalPayme.description: Amount of the total principal payments made during the annual reporting period.

LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseAccruedInter.label: Line of Credit Facility, Increase, Accrued Interest
LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseAccruedInter.description: Increase for accrued, but unpaid interest on the credit facility for the period.

LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateAtPeriod.label: Line of Credit Facility, Interest Rate at Period End
LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateAtPeriod.description: The effective interest rate at the end of the reporting period.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, reflects the carrying amount of unpaid loan amounts due from related parties at the balance sheet date.

LongTermDebtCurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Current Maturities
LongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt, classified as current. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermNotesAndLoans.label: Notes and Loans, Noncurrent
LongTermNotesAndLoans.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNonredeemable.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNonredeemable.description: Portion of net income (loss) attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossOth.label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Other Noncontrolling Interests, Redeemable
NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossOth.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to other redeemable noncontrolling equity holder.

NotesAndLoansPayable.label: Notes and Loans Payable
NotesAndLoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Current
OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherLongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
OtherLongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Other Short-term Borrowings
OtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Amount of borrowings classified as other, maturing within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDeb.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDeb.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from other long-term debt.

ProceedsFromSaleOfMachineryAndEquipment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Machinery and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash inflow from sale of machinery and equipment.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

SaleLeasebackTransactionTransactionCosts.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Transaction Costs, Financing Activities
SaleLeasebackTransactionTransactionCosts.description: Amount of cash outflow for transaction costs in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, closing and debt issuance costs.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which the current fair value of the underlying stock exceeds the exercise price of options outstanding.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested Options Forfeited, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of non-vested options forfeited.

ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.label: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value
TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.description: Value of accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value during the period.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Option, Increase for Cost Recognition
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for option under share-based payment arrangement.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, from recovery.

AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AmountOfDilutiveSecuritiesStockOptionsAn.label: Dilutive Securities, Effect on Basic Earnings Per Share, Options and Restrictive Stock Units
AmountOfDilutiveSecuritiesStockOptionsAn.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of stock options or restrictive stock units (RSUs).

CapitalUnits.label: Capital Units, Value
CapitalUnits.description: Value of capital units or capital shares. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

DebtConversionOriginalDebtInterestRateOf.label: Debt Conversion, Original Debt, Interest Rate of Debt
DebtConversionOriginalDebtInterestRateOf.description: "The rate of interest that was being paid on the original debt issue that is being converted in the noncash (or part noncash) transaction. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

DebtSecuritiesCurrent.label: Debt Securities, Current
DebtSecuritiesCurrent.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as current.

DebtSecuritiesNoncurrent.label: Debt Securities, Noncurrent
DebtSecuritiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

DeferredFinanceCostsCurrentGross.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Gross, Current
DeferredFinanceCostsCurrentGross.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards.description: Amount, before allocation of a valuation allowances, of deferred tax assets attributable to deductible tax credit carryforwards including, but not limited to, research, foreign, general business, alternative minimum tax, and other deductible tax credit carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the allowance for doubtful accounts.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Impairment Losses
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from estimated impairment losses.

DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuatio.label: Deferred Taxes, Business Combination, Valuation Allowance, Available to Reduce Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuatio.description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded in a business combination against deductible temporary differences for which related tax benefits will be recorded as a reduction of the acquired entity's other noncurrent intangible assets if those tax benefits subsequently become realizable.

DeferredTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredTaxLiabilities.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangement.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Leasing Arrangements
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangement.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from leasing arrangements.

EquityMethodInvestmentAggregateCost.label: Equity Method Investment, Aggregate Cost
EquityMethodInvestmentAggregateCost.description: This element represents the aggregate cost of investments accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

EquityMethodInvestmentOtherThanTemporary.label: Equity Method Investment, Other than Temporary Impairment
EquityMethodInvestmentOtherThanTemporary.description: This item represents an other than temporary decline in value that has been recognized against an investment accounted for under the equity method of accounting. The excess of the carrying amount over the fair value of the investment represents the amount of the write down which is or was reflected in earnings. The written down value is a new cost basis with the adjusted value of the investment becoming its new carrying value subject to the equity accounting method. Evidence of a loss in value might include, but would not necessarily be limited to, absence of an ability to recover the carrying amount of the investment or inability of the investee to sustain an earnings capacity which would justify the carrying amount of the investment.

EquityMethodInvestments.label: Equity Method Investments
EquityMethodInvestments.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations to be paid to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAm.label: Line of Credit Facility, Average Outstanding Amount
LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAm.description: Average amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateDuringPe.label: Line of Credit Facility, Interest Rate During Period
LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateDuringPe.description: The effective interest rate during the reporting period.

LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPaymentPrinc.label: Line of Credit Facility, Periodic Payment, Principal
LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPaymentPrinc.description: Amount of the required periodic payment applied to principal.

LoansAssumed1.label: Loans Assumed
LoansAssumed1.description: The fair value of loans assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

LongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
LongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermLoansFromBank.label: Loans Payable to Bank, Noncurrent
LongTermLoansFromBank.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans from a bank with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, excluding current portion.

LongTermLoansPayable.label: Loans Payable, Noncurrent
LongTermLoansPayable.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

LossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Loss on Sale of Investments
LossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A loss would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is less than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Loss included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

MinorityInterestChangeInRedemptionValue.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Change in Redemption Value
MinorityInterestChangeInRedemptionValue.description: Change in noncontrolling interest during the period as a result of a change in the redemption value of redeemable noncontrolling interest.

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Net, Current
OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentsForLoans.label: Payments for Loans
PaymentsForLoans.description: Cash payments for and related to principal collection on loans related to operating activities.

PaymentsToAcquireAssetsInvestingActiviti.label: Payments to Acquire Assets, Investing Activities
PaymentsToAcquireAssetsInvestingActiviti.description: Aggregate cash payments for a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include securities, other types of investments, or productive assets, are purchased from third-party sellers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate payments for all asset purchases that are classified as investing activities.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Noncurrent
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromBankDebt.label: Proceeds from Bank Debt
ProceedsFromBankDebt.description: The cash inflow from bank borrowing during the year.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Short-term Investments
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: The cash inflow from maturities, prepayments, calls and collections of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from short-term debt classified as other.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

RedemptionPremium.label: Redemption Premium
RedemptionPremium.description: The excess of the (1) fair value of consideration transferred to the holders of a security in excess of (2) the carrying amount of the security reported on the registrant's balance sheet, which will be deducted from net earnings to derive net earnings available to common shareholders. This amount is generally an adjustment considered in the computation of earnings per share.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Finance Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SaleAndLeasebackTransactionGainLossNet.label: Sale and Leaseback Transaction, Gain (Loss), Net
SaleAndLeasebackTransactionGainLossNet.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale and leaseback transaction from transfer of asset accounted for as sale.

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeited in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that were forfeited during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeitures, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average fair value as of the grant date of equity-based award plans other than stock (unit) option plans that were not exercised or put into effect as a result of the occurrence of a terminating event.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value at grant date for nonvested equity-based awards issued during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value as of grant date pertaining to an equity-based award plan other than a stock (or unit) option plan for which the grantee gained the right during the reporting period, by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash in accordance with the terms of the arrangement.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Aggregate Intrinsic Value, Outstanding
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Intrinsic value of outstanding award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

UnsecuredDebt.label: Unsecured Debt
UnsecuredDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.label: Value Added Tax Receivable, Current
ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesRestrictedS.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Restricted Stock
